author: Jason Stavely
comment: I've just wasted my money. It won't load on to my sony smartwatch 3. Now it's too late to get a refund. Steer clear and buy a watch face that works.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content:
Hi, Jason,

Thank you for your feedback. Please, allow for 5-10 min so that your watch receives all of the required watch face resources (sometimes it takes longer than expected for various reasons). And make sure that you follow the right instructions (in the description).

Hope it helps!

author: Clayton Grant
comment: Won't install on my Asus 2. I've resynced twice and reinstalled. Please fix

author: Dmitry Bruso
comment: One of my favorite wahtch face

author: Adam Langworthy
comment: This is a really great digital watch face. The only thing stopping me from giving 5 stars is the lack of options to be able to turn on and off certain features, like the weather or the steps/stopwatch/etc. widgets. Just giving the user a choice would improve functionality greatly with no detriment to user experience.
title: Great

author: sean pearson
comment: I love this watch face...I especially love how the seconds tracer goes across the flat tire instead of disappearing below... Clean look, great color. It's perfect!
title: Love it!

author: John Burnett
comment: Moto 360 v2. Did a complete re-pair of watch and since that it's worked perfectly.  Amended review accordingly and many thanks for the developers prompt and helpful responses.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! We have given you a feedback on e-mail. Hope you will change your rating after we fix your issue.

title: Love it.

author: Lech Deregowski
comment: Great numeral choice, however weather seems rather inaccurate and rarely updates when you need it to.
title: Weather needs work.

author: A Sergejevs
comment: There are no pulse rate option,despite the watch (lg urban) has it and other faces are showing it. I want refund!
title: Not working as promised!

author: Peter Chua
comment: I already purchased the app and i cant find it on my gear manager. Im using the first gen of the samsung gear.

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Peter, Samsung gear based on Tizen OS. Contact us boost.core1@gmail.com I hope we can help you to find it on Samsung Store

title: It doesnt show up on my gear manager.

author: Paul Ciurej
comment: Awesome face.. How do i get weather to update on its own... I have to keep selecting update weather in settings everytime i wanne check weather...

reply.author: BoostApp
reply.content: Hello! It is updating automatically every hour.

author: Billy
comment: This is a keeper. Beautiful, retro styled design with step counter and blingy second hand.
title: Brilliant

author: Rita Carter
comment: Love the color choices. Temperature is accurate.
title: Works Great
